title: Monetization Of Application
body: Add Adverts to the Bottom of the Application for the EOH Connect Event

title: [WIP] Add Dockerfile
body:
Closes #84 

- Based on node:6 standard docker image

title: Consider moving game state to server
body: In order for people not to hack the game, consider moving state to the server.

title: Add sub-menu for more contextual options

milestone.description: Upgrade to HAPI.js v17 utilising async/await. Upgrade the Aqua engine and refresh the UI using CA's new Mineral-UI.

body: We want to add more graphs, but there isn't space on the navbar. Consider adding a sub-menu. Do we need to re-think this strategy?

milestone.description: Minor improvements incl. new events feature for the EOH ICT Conference.

title: Error handling when Redis is down
body:
events.js:182
      throw er; // Unhandled 'error' event
      ^

Error: Redis connection to localhost:6379 failed - connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:6379
    at Object.exports._errnoException (util.js:1022:11)
    at exports._exceptionWithHostPort (util.js:1045:20)
    at TCPConnectWrap.afterConnect [as oncomplete] (net.js:1146:14)

title: Email verification failed state
body: Create feature whereby if a user tries to login before verification, they will get another email to verify...also inform user during login that they can't login before.

title: Swap the Bcrypt module, as it's causing issues in Cloud environments
